sentences.en: But let's go ahead and start with sleepers.
sentences.zh: 那我们先从连体睡衣开始吧。
sentences.phonetic_us: /bʌt lɛts ɡoʊ əˈhɛd ænd stɑrt wɪð ˈslipərz/

sentences.en: I love sleepers, of course, for sleeping, but also for throughout the day.
sentences.zh: 我很喜欢连体睡衣，当然，它们很适合睡觉，不过白天穿也很合适。
sentences.phonetic_us: /aɪ lʌv ˈslipərz, əv kɔrs, fɔr ˈslipɪŋ, bʌt ˈɔlsoʊ fɔr θruˈaʊt ðə deɪ/

sentences.en: They keep baby nice and warm.
sentences.zh: 而且能让宝宝保持温暖。

sentences.en: I look for cotton for all of my clothing, especially for newborns, and I tend to stick towards more neutral colors, something with a subtle pattern like this.
sentences.zh: 我的所有衣物都会找纯棉的，尤其是给刚出生的宝宝，而且我倾向于中性色调，比如像这样稍微带一点图案。
sentences.phonetic_us: /aɪ lʊk fɔr ˈkɑtən fɔr ɔl əv maɪ ˈkloʊðɪŋ, ɪˈspɛʃəli fɔr ˈnuˌbɔrnz, ænd aɪ tɛnd tə stɪk təˈwɔrdz mɔr ˈnutrəl ˈkʌlərz, ˈsʌmθɪŋ wɪð ə ˈsʌtəl ˈpætərn laɪk ðɪs/

sentences.en: And I will go ahead and put like how many of each clothing item I look for, because that was something as a new mom, I wasn't really sure how many sleepers, how many onesies would be helpful.
sentences.zh: 我之后会把每类衣物需要的件数放在这儿——作为新手妈妈的，我不是很确定该准备多少件连体睡衣和连体衣才够用。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd aɪ wɪl ɡoʊ əˈhɛd ænd pʊt laɪk haʊ ˈmɛni əv iʧ ˈkloʊðɪŋ ˈaɪtəm aɪ lʊk fɔr, bɪˈkɔz ðæt wəz ˈsʌmθɪŋ æz ə nu mɑm, aɪ ˈwɑzənt ˈrɪli ʃʊr haʊ ˈmɛni ˈslipərz, haʊ ˈmɛni ˈwʌnziz wʊd bi ˈhɛlpfəl/
